name: Mosh Pit
description:
The biggest band of the century, Toxic Brunch, is in the middle of playing their “Keep Punk Alive” world tour when they are suddenly attacked! An evil, Punk-hating, corporation has sent an army of robots to destroy the band and stop the spread of their pro-Punk message. Thankfully, Toxic Brunch’s Heads of Security, Urban and Boombox, are here to save the day!

Grab a friend and help protect Toxic Brunch for the final four stops of their world tour in this two-player arcade-style beat ‘em up. Work together to smash those annoying robots and maybe even take down the evil corporation for good!
